snippet: The North indicated that it was moving toward negotiations after months of threats to launch nuclear strikes at the United States and South Korea.
abstract: North Korea proposes high-level talks with the United States, saying that it is ready to discuss easing tensions and, eventually, removal of nuclear weapons from the Korean Peninsula.
lead_paragraph: The North indicated that it was moving toward negotiations after months of threats to launch nuclear strikes at the United States and South Korea.

headline.main: After Plans Stall for Talks With South Korea, the North Sends an Invitation to the U.S.
headline.print_headline: After Plans Stall for Talks With South Korea, the North Sends an Invitation to the U.S.

keywords.value: Arms Control and Limitation and Disarmament
keywords.name: subject
